ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Test of ...
ygData.msgSnippet: Yikes.  The reward for the Test of Steel on the Rathe was posted to EQlizer. Its pretty awesome.  I doubt anyone below level 50 could win any of these events
ygData.messageBody:
Yikes. The reward for the Test of Steel on the Rathe was posted to EQlizer.
Its pretty awesome. I doubt anyone below level 50 could win any of these
events anyhow. Every event I've been to has been completely dominated by
characters over level 40 regardless of the inappropriate nature of their
level with respect to the event. As a result the npc's were given powers of
instant death and invulnerability.

They need to create a level flag for zones that prevents people over a
certain level from entering while an event is happening so that they could
actually hold events for people under 50th level.

Kit

http://gameznet.com/eq/equipment/empower_ring.html

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Tuesday, June 06, 2000 9:17 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Test of ...


It does appear that once again, Bards have been left out. Please do
mention this.

Talies the Wanderer
